text: Jeremy Strong (born December 25, 1978) is an American actor. He is best known for his starring role as Kendall Roy in the HBO series Succession. Strong has also appeared in many successful movies such as Lincoln, Zero Dark Thirty, Selma, The Big Short, Molly's Game and The Gentlemen. He has won an Emmy Award, a Tony Award, a Golden Globe Award and three Screen Actors Guild Awards. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Boston Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Jeremy Strong (actor)
